title: Animate Dead
content:
ead: Ghoul Pack

Level 6 Spell Slot

Animate Dead: Flying Ghoul

Level 5 Spell Slot

Create a ghoul that specialises in melee combat. The target must be a medium or small corpse.

STR 16, DEX 17, CON 10, INT 11, WIS 10, CHA 8

Claws: Lash out with deadly claws dealing 3d6 + Strength Modifier Slashing damage and possibly Paralyse the target.

Devour: Bite a knocked out, prone, or sleeping target, and deal 3d10 + Strength Modifier Slashing damage. Heal that many hit points.
